entities.name: mad-eye
entities.description: Mad-Eye is a character who has used magic improperly, and is in trouble with the law. He is mentioned as having a record of improper use of magic.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is a character who is writing notes about Mad-Eye's case, and is trying to get him off with a minor charge.

entities.name: mr diggory
entities.description: Mr. Diggory is a character who is discussing the case with Mr. Weasley, and thinks that Mad-Eye will have trouble proving his innocence.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is a character who is being looked at by Mr. Diggory, but no further information about her is provided in this passage.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley is trying to help Mad-Eye by getting him off with a minor charge.
Mad-Eye's case is being discussed between Mr. Weasley and Mr. Diggory, with Mr. Diggory providing his thoughts on the matter.
Mrs. Weasley is related to Mad-Eye through her marriage to Mr. Weasley, but no further information about their relationship is provided in this passage.
